data.name: Ghostbusters: Rise of the Ghost Lord
data.app_name: Ghostbusters: Rise of the Ghost Lord
data.description:
INFESTATION UPDATE – OUT NOW

Embark on a mission to track and trap a particularly pesky intruder in the thrilling new Infestation game mode! Bust mischievous ghosts as you go, before facing off against the stubborn entity with your team in a final, slimy showdown.

The Full Containment Edition includes a season pass with six months of DLC:
4 Equipment Skins
10 Additional Character Costumes
Slimer Hunt feature & collectible
Additional Bonus Content!

Immerse yourself in the thrills and fun of bustin’ ghosts like never before on the Meta Quest 2 and Meta Quest 3. Quash a Mini-Pufts invasion in your own home in the exclusive game mode, Mini-Puft Mayhem – featuring the Meta Quest 3’s unique mixed reality capabilities.

The fight against the Ghost Lord is just beginning. Follow us on social media to be the first to know about all the upcoming content, including FREE game modes, more playable avatars and equipment skins, and other surprises to-be-announced.

Join our community on the Ghostbusters Discord for info, tips, and game support!
https://discord.gg/ndreams

From Sony Pictures Virtual Reality (SPVR) and the award-winning VR game developer, nDreams.
